General.Name: Kukbo Design Co. Ltd
General.Description: Kukbo Design Co., Ltd. operates as an interior design company in South Korea and internationally. It undertakes design works for office, hotel, casino, building, commercial/retail, training institute, hospital, religious, and exhibition projects. The company was formerly known as Kukbo CNS Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kukbo Design Co., Ltd. in 2002. Kukbo Design Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
